    • Method Detail

      • checkDateIsInThePast

        boolean checkDateIsInThePast(Calendar date)
        checks date is in the past
        Parameters:
        date - the date being checked
        Returns:
        true if date is in the past

      • generateCalendarItem

        Calendar generateCalendarItem(int year,
                            int month,
                            int day,
                            int hour,
                            int minute)
        transforms the int inputs into a calendar object of type GregorianCalendar.
        Parameters:
        year - the year to add to the Calendar object
        month - the month to add to the Calendar object
        day - the day to add to the Calendar object
        Returns:
        a date(GregorianCalendar) object

      • compareTwoDates

        boolean compareTwoDates(Calendar date1,
                      Calendar date2)
        note: Calendar.before() already does this.
        Parameters:
        date1 - first date to compare
        date2 - second date to compare
        Returns:
        returns true if date1 comes before date2
